channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: MASSIVE fly tip 96 Belgrave Road, 2nd November
item.description:
PLEASE can the council do something?? This is a constant issue. Either the rubbish is not being picked up OR people are dumping out of hours... This has gone on for so long and residents feel defeated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No bollard to stop cars driving through, 2nd November
item.description:
Ever since they re-painted the road markings and removed the bollard at the end of glenarm road I’ve seen multiple cars drive through the small space at speed. A new bollard or obstruction needs to be put in to prevent this as it’s dangerous
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping still, 2nd November
item.description:
I reported this already and it was marked as resolved. Nothing has been resolved, noone has contacted me, all of the rubbish and old furniture and waste is still piled up outside my house. There are 2 sinks, 2 radiators, 1 hob, 1 bin, kitchen sideboards, and lots of random rubbish. People are now adding household waste to the pile. The neighbourhood is full of small children who play on this street and it's unsafe, unsanitary and unsightly. Please remove the items and please don't mark this as fixed without taking action, like last time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signpost bracket dangerously sticking out onto hard shoulder, hit by 2 Essex Fire appliances, 2nd November
item.description:
The signpost bracket, believed to be for a disused sign, sticks out into the hard shoulder. It has been hit by 2 separate Essex Fire Service appliances who were using the hard shoulder to respond to an emergency, both incurring damage to their wing mirrors. Exact location not known as crews did not stop, between J28 and J27.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M25, Navestock, Brentwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 62 Dynham Rd, 2nd November
item.description:
The street light in front of 62 Dynham Road is flashing rapidly throught the night. We’ve already reported and your reply was “we found the issue was from a private security light outside 63 as it comes and off as people walk past.”. This is incorrect - there is a private security light but it’s separate from the street light which still has an issue. It is flashing right now too and for the last few days. Could you please attend and fix?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Dynham Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water being forced up through the road, 2nd November
item.description:
A very large amount to f water is being forced up through the road surface and causing flooding all along Masons Hill from Napier Road, all the way to Wendover Road. Water is pouring along the roadside. It is impossible to walk this length of Masons Hill without getting sprayed/splashed by passing vehicles due to the large amount of water in the road. Please can the water main and road be repaired as soon as possible so it’s safe for road users and pedestrians. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149b, Masons Hill, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thornet Wood Road, Bickley, London

item.title: Both drains either side of Napier Road are blocked., 2nd November
item.description:
Please can these drains be cleared as soon as possible. The burst water main has caused a build up of water. We can’t walk along this side of Masons Hill as all pedestrians, dogs etc are getting splashed by passing vehicles. Please can they be cleared as soon as possible. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Masons Hill, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
